00005 bool calc_air_data_callback(last_letter::calc_air_data::Request &req, last_letter::calc_air_data::Response &res)
00006 {
00007         double u = req.speeds.x;
00008         double v = req.speeds.y;
00009         double w = req.speeds.z;
00010 
00011         double airspeed = sqrt(pow(u,2)+pow(v,2)+pow(w,2));
00012         double alpha = atan2(w,u);
00013         double beta = 0;
00014         if (u==0) {
00015                 if (v==0) {
00016                         beta=0;
00017                 }
00018                 else {
00019                         beta=asin(v/abs(v));
00020                 }
00021         
00022         }
00023         else {
00024                 beta = atan2(v,u);
00025         }
00026         
00027         res.airspeed = airspeed;
00028         res.alpha = alpha;
00029         res.beta = beta;
00030         return true;
00031 }
00032 
00033 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00034 {
00035         ros::init(argc, argv, "calc_air_data_server");
00036         ros::NodeHandle n;
00037 
00038         ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("calc_air_data",calc_air_data_callback);
00039         ROS_INFO("calc_air_data_server ready");
00040         ros::spin();
00041 
00042         return 0;
00043 }
